content: readme.md hn ratiohacker news top 50 stories ranked comment/score ratio.whybeing long- hacker news reader, realized most interesting hn submissions me are two categories:stories attract lot attention comments, signaling active extended debatesstories attract lot attention few comments, signaling very insightful post requires further commentshence, used comment/score ratio sort top hn submissions locate stories the top the bottom the list.resultsresults datenote new "promoted" stories low votes hn-backed job listings are filtered. to run script$ pip install -r requirements.txt$ python hn-ratio.py > results/result-xxx.txt
